- Error dialog title must be 'Introduce Parameter Object' not 'Problem'
- Patch is not even close to minimal...

- there are strange changes in the property file
- also the error description could be more specific. not 'A refactoring...'
- the error description is not good when an interface method is implemented
- the local var name 'newMethod' doesn't make sense

Created an attachment (id=68567)
Fix only

This patch does fix this bug, but it does not solve the real problem.

Patch is good.

But, right below your changes you use '+' to add two strings. You should not do that:
1. Its slow, use StringBuffer
2. It can not be translated correctly, org.eclipse.jdt.internal.corext.util.Messages.format(String, Object)

But I think in this particular case translation should be not a problem.
